author: Staff Reporter
text:
The K.G. Chavadi Police have arrested two persons in connection with the alleged attack on two Christian priests of a home for persons affected by AIDS near K.G. Chavadi on Friday.

Case registered

Police said that Fathers of ASSISI Snekhalaya Stalin Mathew (31) and Josh Payalee and its pubic relations officer Joseph Mathew were leaving the Home in a car when a group of seven locals blocked their way, attacked them and damaged the car.

A case was registered against Santhosh, Shanmugam, Surendharan, Manoj, Pradeep, Maheshwaran and Sathish in this connection.

On Saturday police arrested two of them.

Search is on for the five others.
title: Two held for attacking priests
